body:
Is it illegal for me to setup a Macro key to type 
"t Please feel free to take full advantage of the /report command" so i do not have to waste time in game to get people off my back when they accuse me of hacking?
body_tagged:
Is it illegal for me to setup a Macro key to type 
"t Please feel free to take full advantage of the /report command" so i do not have to waste time in game to get people off my back when they accuse me of hacking?
title: Is this illegal to do?

replies.body: Text macros are allowed, just don't use it for spamming.
replies.body_tagged: Text macros are allowed, just don't use it for spamming.

replies.body: BTW, how do you set one up? I've been looking for something like this
replies.body_tagged: BTW, how do you set one up? I've been looking for something like this

replies.body: I was thinking of using one that automatically does /join :p
replies.body_tagged: I was thinking of using one that automatically does /join :p

replies.body:
Depends, Logitech has its own Macro Software, but you may just simply write scripts if you have a regular keyboard where you would press 2 keys to activate a macro.
this is Logitechs 
http://www.logitech.com/en-us/support/gaming-software?section=downloads&osid=14&bit=64
How to use: 
http://logitech-en-amr.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/21502/section/troubleshoot/crid/411/lt_p...
And this would be for any other keyboard:
http://www.autohotkey.com/docs/Tutorial.htm

replies.body: If you have razer gear, you can download Razer Synapse 2.0 and set macros from there if you have a razer keyboard, or mouse.
replies.body_tagged: If you have razer gear, you can download Razer Synapse 2.0 and set macros from there if you have a razer keyboard, or mouse.
